headline: Is There an Opportunity in Conagra After Recent Share Price Slide in 2025?
summary: If you have been eyeing Conagra Brands and wondering whether it is the right time to invest, you are not alone. With a stock price that recently closed at $18.50, many investors are trying to untangle what recent movements mean for the company’s prospects. Conagra’s performance has been turbulent, dropping 2.2% over the last week and slipping 3.5% in the past month. The year-to-date story is even more dramatic, with shares down 33.1%, and the one-year plunge standing at 33.7%. For those with...
